select n.n_no, n.n_title, n.n_content, TO_CHAR(n.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_date, n.n_hit, n.reg_id, e.E_NAME, NVL(c.n_att, 0) as n_att from notice n join EMPLOYEE e on n.reg_id = e.E_NO left join (select n_no, count(*) as n_att from NOTICE_FILE group by n_no) c on c.n_no = n.n_no
AND n_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND n_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND n.reg_id IN (select e_no from EMPLOYEE where e_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
order by n_no desc

select n.n_no, n.n_title, n.n_content, TO_CHAR(n.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_date , n.n_hit, n.reg_id, nf.n_filename, nf.n_file_no from notice n LEFT JOIN NOTICE_FILE nf ON n.n_no = nf.n_no WHERE n.n_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (n_no, n_title, n_content, n_hit, reg_date, mod_date, reg_id, mod_id) values (seq_notice_no.nextval,#{n_title},#{n_content}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, #{e_no}, #{e_no})

INTO notice_attachment(na_no, n_no, na_originname, na_newname, na_path, na_size) VALUES (#{item.na_no}, #{item.n_no}, #{item.na_originname}, #{item.na_newname}, #{item.na_path}, #{item.na_size})
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.update: update notice set n_title=#{n_title}, n_content=#{n_content}, mod_date=sysdate, mod_id=#{e_no} where n_no = #{n_no}
update notice set n_hit = n_hit+1 where n_no = #{value}
